CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1953, pg. 6 reads: "To Appear In Play - On Friday evening, May 8, at the Clark Memorial Baptist Church in Homestead, the Junior Harmony Club of the same city will present a three-act play entitled "Three Bright Girls." Members of the club are participating in play which is being directed by the club sponsor, Mrs. W. Allen Goode.  The Junior Harmony Club is a charitable organization which has done many worth-while things in the community during the past eight years.  Members of the club are, left to right, front row: Lois Purifoy, secretary; Yvonne Smith, vice president, and Alzera Harris, president.  Second row: Billie Goode, sponsor; Barbara Montgomery, Eleanor Taylor and LaVerne Johnson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Junior Harmony Club members, left to right front row; Lois Purifoy, Yvonne Smith, and Alzera Harris, Second row; Billie Goode, sponsor; Barbara Montgomery, Eleanor Taylor and LaVerne Johnson, gathered in interior with geometrically patterned floor, another version
